variantA.headline: Climb to your best SAT score with PeakPrep
variantA.subhead: Personalized Route Maps, built-in flashcards, and full-length checkpoints to guide your climb.

variantB.headline: Reach the Peak of your SAT
variantB.subhead: Train smarter with expedition-style study plans and adaptive practice tailored to your weaknesses.

features.title: Personalized Route Maps
features.description: AI-generated study plans that adapt to your pace, target score, and timeline.

features.title: Tools & Supplies
features.description: Spaced repetition flashcards with SAT-accurate content for every concept.

features.title: Trail Checkpoints
features.description: Timed practice tests with instant feedback and detailed explanations.

features.title: Backtrack & Re-Climb
features.description: Review analytics and track your elevation gain across all trails.

faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Pro or Student Yearly subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 14 days for a full refund.

faq.question: What's the difference between Free and Pro?
faq.answer: Free includes basic features with limits. Pro removes all limits, adds advanced analytics, and provides priority AI generation for faster response times.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.quote: PeakPrep's Route Maps helped me stay organized and focused. I went from 1200 to 1380 in 3 months.

testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.quote: The checkpoint practice tests were game-changers. The instant feedback helped me understand my mistakes immediately.

testimonials.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonials.quote: I loved the mountain theme‚Äîit made studying feel like an adventure instead of a chore. Reached my target score!

trustBar.text: Trusted by over 12,000 students climbing to their target scores

seo.title: PeakPrep ‚Äî Mountain-themed SAT prep app
